name: Puzzle Frame
description:
Enter a quiet place where you can relax and solve sliding puzzles.
Enjoy stunning landscapes accompanied by soothing music.

Puzzle Frame is an easygoing game that invites you to solve sliding puzzles at your own pace.
You'll be presented with a gallery containing more than 150 meticulously selected landscape photos accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack.
A clean interface with a couple of options will allow you to tune the puzzle's difficulty to your mood.

There's no high scores, no hidden doors, and no plot twist, just a zen place for your mind to wander.
Capture a peaceful moment, frame a puzzle... experience bliss.

Key features

  • More than 150 stunning landscapes to enjoy
  • 40 minutes of relaxing music by the talented Josh Woodward
  • From easy to challenging with 2 game modes and 4 difficulty levels
